name: Melinda Cole
description: Hello,am Melinda by name, i am 31 years old single woman, never been married and have no kids, am simple,understanding,passionate,God fearing,loving,caring,open minded and family oriented… i like cooking,swimming,watching movie,travelling,helping,going to beach and reading….. am new to this and am here looking for a serious and long term relationship with a serious and a reliable man if possible out here and i hope it works for me as it does for my friend.
